trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Atlantic City
There were no other sightings in Atlantic City on or around December 15th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving with my grandfather. We were going to his shore house. I was looking out the window and i saw a old house, which i always saw going to the shore house. I saw a triangle shaped ufo about 25' above the roof. As we drove past i lost sight of it as it went behind the trees.
